Source file src/github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/core/property/registry.go

     1	package property
     2	
     3	import (
     4		"fmt"
     5		"sync"
     6	
     7		"github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/core/data"
     8		"github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/logger"
     9	)
    10	
    11	var (
    12		props = make(map[string]string)
    13		mut   = sync.RWMutex{}
    14	)
    15	
    16	// Get returns the value of the property for the given id
    17	// If it is an environment property (for example {MY_PROP})
    18	// The value will be looked up in the os environment
    19	func Get(id string) string {
    20		mut.RLock()
    21		defer mut.RUnlock()
    22		prop, ok := props[id]
    23		if !ok {
    24			return prop
    25		}
    26		return data.ResolveEnv(prop)
    27	}
    28	
    29	func Register(id, value string) error {
    30		mut.Lock()
    31		defer mut.Unlock()
    32	
    33		if len(id) == 0 {
    34			return fmt.Errorf("error registering property, id is empty")
    35		}
    36	
    37		if _, ok := props[id]; ok {
    38			return fmt.Errorf("Error registering property, property already registered for id '%s'", id)
    39		}
    40	
    41		logger.Debugf("Registering property id: '%s', value: '%s'", id, value)
    42	
    43		props[id] = value
    44	
    45		return nil
    46	}
    47
